title: Beverly Hills
name: Two Rodeo
content: A fusion of opulence and European design, the charming Two Rodeo is located in the heart of Beverly Hills' famous shopping district. Just three, very luxurious blocks long, Two Rodeo features an eclectic collection of restaurants, salons and boutiques: Urasawa, Cole Haan, Versace, Gianfranco Ferre, McCormick and Schmick's, Tiffany & Co. and Badgley Mischka to name a few.
